justification: Acknowledges A’s floor vs. B’s ceiling, but misreads B’s needs. B already has multiple high-upside WRs and prefers rookies/injured buy-lows; Chris Garcia is Tier 5 with a declining role, offering dubious ceiling. Ben King, while low volatility, is valuable RB depth for B. A also prefers proven veterans/workhorse RBs, which King is not. The 0.75 acceptance probability is unrealistic. Rationale is generic and lacks evidence.
